Harry June

DKB

Introduction

Han Harry-June is a South Korean singer and dancer under Brave Entertainment. He is the maknae of the boy group DKB.

Harry-June was introduced as a member of DKB on November 26, 2019. He officially made his debut with the group on February 3, 2020, with the mini-album "Youth".
